DOC.brief_title: Low High Dose Zonisamide Children Monotherapy
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Pediatric patient epilepsy whose age 2~15 year old . 2 . Patients least two seizure last 6 month entry . 3 . Patients never take antiepileptic drug . 4 . Patients chance progressive disease base result magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) electroencephalogram ( EEG ) . 5 . Agreement guardian need . Exclusion criterion : 1 . Patients progressive central nervous system ( CNS ) disease . 2 . Patients serious disorder . 3 . Patients abnormal liver function ( serum glutamic oxaloacetic transaminase [ SGOT ] ) ( serum glutamic pyruvic transaminase [ SGPT ] ) value twice normal value . 4 . Patients abnormal renal function ( blood urea nitrogen ( BUN ) Creatinine ) value three time normal value . 5 . Hemolytic anemia .
